EmailTemplate.description: This is for the instant value test.
EmailTemplate.name: Instant Perceived Value
EmailTemplate.subject: Want to know what's next?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome! Your domain www.domain.com has been purchased.
We are hard at work setting up your Lead Stream account. Here is some important information you should know about your account!
We've purchased your lead site Domain.
Over the next 24 hours we'll be creating your Lead Site and can review on your setup call.
Your setup call is scheduled for August 8, 2017 at 10AM
. On this call, we'll review your account details, Lead Site and personalized dashboard.
We're here for you.
Email Us Now
